ChestCBInclineShoulderRaise.name: Cable Incline Shoulder Raise
ChestCBInclineShoulderRaise.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side. Push stirrups out at 30 to 45 until arms are straight and parallel to one another.
ChestCBInclineShoulderRaise.execution: Raise shoulders toward stirrups as high as possible. Lower shoulders down and back and repeat.
ChestCBInclineShoulderRaise.comments: Keep arms straight throughout execution. For convenience, exercise can be performed immediately after warm up on Cable Incline Chest Press.

ChestCBOneArmInclinePush.name: Cable One Arm Incline Push
ChestCBOneArmInclinePush.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp stirrup with one hand. Position elbow out to side, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hand down, slightly higher than shoulder height, slightly narrower than elbow width.
ChestCBOneArmInclinePush.execution: Push stirrup forward and up at 30 to 45 while rotating torso away allowing shoulder to be extended forward. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch, and repeat. Continue with opposite side.
